pageContent: Background: The primary treatments for clinically localized prostate cancer confer equivalent cancer control for most patients but disparate side effects. In the current study, the authors sought to compare health-related quality of life (HRQOL) outcomes after the most commonly used treatments.

metaData.source:
Comparative evaluation of radiation treatments for clinically localized prostate cancer: an updated systematic review
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21646550/
